activities: Varian collects customer personal data from the EU to improve website content, process orders, market products, respond to requests for information about the company and its products, and to complete reservations for seminars conducted by the company. Under direction from our customers, Varian might collect or have access to personal data on a customer, their employees and their clients to fulfill service and product support obligations requested by our customers. Varian collects employee personal data from the EU for employment related purposes, such as for the provision of employment benefits, stock options, education and training, performance appraisals, compensation, business contact directory, company network access and authentication, security management, reporting, and budgeting.
contactoff1: Varian Information Technology and Data Privacy
contacttitle1: Senior Vice President and Chief Information Officer
corpofftitle1: Corporate Senior Vice President, Chief Financial Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: TRUSTe, EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
